name: HTML
story: Built my first static sites at school; now daily use across all web projects.

name: CSS
story: Love it but switched to TailwindCSS. I'll never forget you CSS. I still know my way around it

name: JavaScript
story: Learned it at school. Switched to Typescript a couple years ago for more type-safe operations.

name: TypeScript
story: Adopted during my internship on a Next.js + GraphQL stack; now my default for all new projects.

name: React.js
story: My main front-end framework for building interactive UIs — used in most of my projects with Next.js. Experienced with hooks, context, and modern patterns.

name: Next.js
story: Used for most of my web projects and even this portfolio (App Router, SSG/ISR, API routes).

name: Vite.js
story: Used for a couple small projects.

name: TailwindCSS
story: My go-to styling approach for fast iteration and consistent design systems.

name: Node.js
story: APIs, CLI tooling, and server-side rendering in Next.js projects.

name: Express.js
story: Built REST APIs and small services; familiar with middleware and auth basics.

name: PostgreSQL
story: Primary relational DB during studies and projects; comfortable with schema design and SQL.

name: GraphQL
story: Used it my internship at Embie, using Hasura

name: MongoDB
story: Used it at school while learning React, built a few small projects.

name: Supabase
story: Used it for most of my side projects and prototypes.

name: Java
story: First language I've ever learned; used extensively in coursework and school projects. Learned most of my programming fundamentals through it, even learned most design patterns through it.

name: Spring Boot
story: Learned it at school. During my class we used it to create a simple store web application.

name: C
story: Systems programming fundamentals from coursework (memory, pointers, scripting, systems calls).

name: C#
story: Explored through .NET coursework and while learning Unity at school.

name: .NET
story: Learned at school; built small services and learned ecosystem basics.

name: Unity
story: Learned at school. We even participated in a Game Jam, which was a great experience. You can find the game in the project section

name: Flutter
story: Learned it at school.

name: Swift
story: Built a mobile game for fun and a small Macos utility with SwiftUI. Currently learning more about it.

name: Linux
story: Daily dev environment knowledge: shell, package managers, and basic operations.

name: Git
story: Everyday version control: branching, PRs, and rebasing.

name: GitHub
story: Issues, Actions, and project management for personal and team work.

name: VSCode
story: My primary editor, no surprises.

name: Framer Motion
story: My go-to for smooth UI animations and micro‑interactions in React/Next.js.

name: Figma
story: Always use it to mock up my projects and structure my ideas before I start the production.

name: Prisma
story: Familiar with using Prisma with PostgreSQL for database access in my applications.
